Stretching.name: Stretching
Stretching.info: Get a bit of extra oxygen into your muscles and keep your tendons flexible.

Glass of water.name: Glass of water
Glass of water.info: Drinking enough water is one of the easiest ways to maintain daily health and wellbeing.

Writing.name: Writing
Writing.info: Limber up your brain by expressing yourself with the written word. Poetry, fiction, essays, correspondence—all are great ways to share your ideas with others.

Brisk walk.name: Brisk walk
Brisk walk.info: Get your heart rate up with this simple aerobic exercise.

Portion of fruit.name: Portion of fruit
Portion of fruit.info: A healthy treat. Recommended for daily consumption.

Drawing.name: Drawing
Drawing.info: Sketch, scribble, design, doodle—all great activities to flex your creative muscles and shift mental gears.

Volunteering.name: Volunteering
Volunteering.info: Take some time to help out in your community. Giving back is one of the best ways to feel fulfilled.

Yoga.name: Yoga
Yoga.info: Center yourself in your body and calm your mind, while also improving your fitness and flexibility.

Article.name: Article
Article.info: Get out of your social network and take time to read a long-form piece that helps you focus and keeps you informed.

Painting.name: Painting
Painting.info: Learn the theory of color, try out the techniques of the masters, experiment with your own style, or just break out the finger paint.

Podcast.name: Podcast
Podcast.info: Keep up with your favorite topics.

Live music.name: Live music
Live music.info: Go enjoy your favorite artists, or discover new ones!

Book chapter.name: Book chapter
Book chapter.info: Make some progress in that favorite book—relax and engage your imagination!

Music practice.name: Music practice
Music practice.info: Getting good at an instrument is all about practice. Work on perfecting your art so you can share the beauty of music with audiences large or small.

Demonstration.name: Demonstration
Demonstration.info: Make your voice heard while attracting attention for your cause.

Portion of salad.name: Portion of salad
Portion of salad.info: Raw greens and other ingredients promote overall health, while also helping those who're counting calories.

Phone banking.name: Phone banking
Phone banking.info: Reach out to advocate for a cause you're passionate about. Work towards a better future one person at a time.

Meditation.name: Meditation
Meditation.info: Focus on quieting your mind. Pay attention to your breath and observe your thoughts.

Deep breathing.name: Deep breathing
Deep breathing.info: A good way to settle your mind and relax.
